title: PlantTracker
description: Android app to track the moisture, light, and humidity levels of houseplants and configure push notifications
Uses multiâ€‘threaded gRPC Java server to manage communication between the app, database, and Raspberry Pi sensor devices
Uses Firebase Messenger to send push notifications when plants fall below desired moisture and humidity levels
Stores plant information, Firebase Storage references, and time series sensor data in a PostgreSQL database
Currently used to track and maintain my collection of 15+ house plants

title: Beeverse
description: 3D Unity survival, city-building game where you design, control, and sustain a bee colony
Keep your bees alive by collecting resources and expanding the colony by building new Honeycombs.
The game starts with a single honeycomb inhabited by your Queen Bee, which you must expand from
Assign Worker Bees tasks to construct honeycombs, collect resources, and raise new Baby Bees
Bees have a lifespan and will passively die from old age over time. The game will end if your Queen Bee dies without a replacement or all bees in your colony die, so keep on building!

title: RecipeShare
description: Cross-platform recipe sharing app built using React Native and Expo with a Supabase backend
Includes full CRUD functionality for managing recipes and cookbooks
Integrates Supabase user authentication to manage account access and sharing cookbooks between users
Key features: create and favourite recipes, organize them into cookbooks, and share those cookbooks with other users
Share collections of recipes at once via cookbooks
Favourite recipes shared with you to copy them to your personal collection

title: GryphHacks Website
description: React website for UoG's 2022 hackathon, GryphHacks.
